messages.zh: 第一关（前）
messages.en: Stage 1 (Before)

messages.zh: 刚才是不是地震了？
messages.en: Was that an earthquake just now?

messages.zh: 对啊！！
messages.en: You're right!!

messages.zh: 毕竟我们离舞台这么近哎！看到了吗！？你看到D.D.D.的表情了吗！？她是怎么做到的！？
messages.en: After all, we're so close to the stage! See! ? Did you see D.D.D expression!? How did she do that!?

messages.zh: 她已经下台了啦，你不要老是这么......等等，这不是又在震了？
messages.en: She's off the stage now, don't always do this... Wait, this place is shaking again?

messages.zh: 哎呀，说不定是低音炮的缘故......慢着。
messages.en: Aiyah, Maybe it's the subwoofer... Wait.

messages.zh: 哎...哎？你也察觉到了？
messages.en: Eh...Eh? Did you noticed that too?
....Run now!

messages.zh: 什、什么？
messages.en: W-What?

messages.zh: 别问那么多了，快跟我走！
messages.en: Stop asking so many questions and come with me now!

messages.zh: 不要挤啊！离我远点！
messages.en: Don't push! Stay away from me!

messages.zh: 你踩着我的脚了！！滚开啊！！
messages.en: You step on my foot! Get away from me!

messages.zh: 有人晕倒了！小心！
messages.en: Somebody fainted! Be careful!

messages.zh: 怎、怎么突然都躁动起来，难道真的是......
messages.en: What, what is with all this sudden commotion, is it really...
...My god.
...It's the Emperor.

messages.zh: 嗯哼，天气不错。
messages.en: Uh-huh, what a nice day.

messages.zh: （欢呼声）
messages.en: (Sounds of cheering)

messages.zh: 大帝！是真人！！啊啊——！
messages.en: Emperor! In person!! Ahhhh——!

messages.zh: 别蠢了！这都什么时候了，你竟然还在意地震！？
messages.en: Don't be so foolish! In a time like this, you still care about the shaking!?

messages.zh: 不，只是，看见大帝，等等，我有点，喘不过气......
messages.en: No, it's just, seeing the Emperor, wait, I need, to catch my breath...

messages.zh: 大帝先生，这边请。
messages.en: Mr.Emperor, this way please.

messages.zh: 各位观众！请退后！退至线后！
messages.en: Audience! Please stand back! Back behind the line!

messages.zh: 喂，那个萨弗拉年轻人。
messages.en: Hey, that young Savra.

messages.zh: 没关系，让他们靠近点。
messages.en: It's okay. Let them come closer.

messages.zh: 可是大帝先生，您一会还有演出，如果出了什么意外......
messages.en: But Mr.Emperor, you will be performing later. Should anything happen to you...

messages.zh: 意外？
messages.en: Should anything happen to me?

messages.zh: 枪击，刺杀，绑架，自杀威胁，意外是指这些东西？
messages.en: You mean shootings, stabbings, kidnappings, suicide threats, accidents?

messages.zh: 这些东西能阻止什么？阻止我吗？
messages.en: What can those things stop? Are you implying those things would stop me?

messages.zh: 不，它们会变成我舞台的一部分，就像语言的意义被节奏消解，你明白吗？
messages.en: No, they will become a part of my stage, like the meaning of a language lost in rhythm, you know?
No, I don't understand...

messages.zh: 简单来说就是节目效果。放轻松，塞壬唱片绝对不会追究你们失责。
messages.en: Simply put, it's for the show effect. Relax, Sirens records won't hold you accountable.

messages.zh: （欢呼声）
messages.en: (Sounds of cheering)

messages.zh: 大帝！！大帝！！大帝！！
messages.en: Emperor!!Emperor!!Emperor!!

messages.zh: 喔，总算来了，快，不要紧张，放轻松，大胆点，相信你自己。
messages.en: Oh, it's finally here. Come on. Don't be so nervous. Relax, get some courage, and believe in yourself.

messages.zh: 什么西哥伦比亚的说唱之神，你，你就是个痞子，一个走狗屎运的幸运儿......
messages.en: What West Columbia rap god, you, you're a rascal, a lucky dog...

messages.zh: 大声点，伙计，大声说话！喂，萨弗拉人，不要赶他走，把麦克风给他。不要慌，这里听我的。
messages.en: Speak up, man, speak up! Hey, Savra, don't send him away. Give him the mic(microphone). Don't panic man. Trust me here.

messages.zh: 你毁了我们的生活，你却坐拥那么多产业，你......你该去死！！
messages.en: You've ruined our lives, and yet you're sitting on so many assets, you... you deserve to die!!

messages.zh: 咿呀——他拔出了一把弩！快躲开！
messages.en: *Babble*——He pulled out a crossbow! Hide!

messages.zh: 不怪我，对，都是你的错，你所谓的说唱帝国建立在多少歌手的牺牲之下——
messages.en: Don't blame me, right, it's all your fault, your so-called rap empire is built on the sacrifice of many singers——

messages.zh: 什么大帝啊，吃屎去吧，你这只下作的企鹅！
messages.en: What Emperor, eat shit, you lousy penguin!

messages.zh: 啊哈，让我想想，到底是谁在耍一些不入流的小手段？媒体，舆论，人身攻击，还有枪杀，哼？
messages.en: Ah-ha, let me remember, who on earth is actually pulling the dirty tricks? Using the media, the press, the personal attacks, the shootings, huh?

messages.zh: 你以为在下水道和垃圾堆里打一圈滚我就认不出你了吗？对那些年轻人开枪让你满足吗，“歌手”？
messages.en: You think I can't recognize you after you've been rolling around in sewers and garbage dumps? Are you content to shoot those young people, "singer"?
You——!

messages.zh: 如果不是我恰好有那么点看不顺眼，你们又会继续“排除”掉多少不合口味的新星。
messages.en: If I didn't happen to feel your actions were distasteful, your ilk would continue to "eliminate" many non-mainstream new stars.

messages.zh: 然后把捞来的钞票堆在自己的澡盆里，唾弃着整个哥伦比亚？
messages.en: And then pile your ill-gotten money in your own bathtub and spurn Colombia as yours?

messages.zh: 闭嘴！给我去死！
messages.en: Shut up! Go to hell!

messages.zh: 快保护大帝先生！
messages.en: Protect Mr.Emperor!

messages.zh: 大帝先生中弹了，快......欸？
messages.en: Emperor was shot, quick...huh?

messages.zh: 开枪的是大帝先生？那家伙的弩被打飞了？
messages.en: Mr.Emperor was the one who shot first? That person's crossbow flew off?

messages.zh: 哒哒哒哒哒，哒！砰！
messages.en: Da, da, da, da! Bang!

messages.zh: 真奇怪。同你废话了这么多，枪口冒烟的人怎么是我？猜猜看？
messages.en: How strage. After listening to all of your nonsense, how come the gun smoke came from mine? Do you want to guess?

messages.zh: 是因为你太没种，还是我光芒万丈，你睁不开眼？
messages.en: Is it because you're too weak, or because I'm so bright, you can't open your eyes properly?

messages.zh: 咕——呃——你随身带着枪械......
messages.en: Gurgh——Ergh——You carry a gun with you...

messages.zh: 如果一个人每天多死个几次，就会养成随身携带武器的好习惯。
messages.en: If a man died more than once a day, he will develop a good habit of carrying weapons with him.

messages.zh: 咳咳——你以为，只有我一个人吗？想想你过去招惹的敌人，你走不出这座汐斯塔市的！
messages.en: *Cough*——You think I'm the only one? Think of your past enemies you've provoked, you will not walk out of Siesta city!

messages.zh: 我的过去比这边虚假的海洋还要宽广，你说的敌人又在哪个犄角旮旯？
messages.en: My past is wider than this false sea, and where are the enemies you mentioned hiding in the nooks and crannies?

messages.zh: 大帝先生！观众里面混着很多他们的同伙，我们处理不过来......
messages.en: Mr.Emperor! There's a lot of them in the audience, we can't handle them all...

messages.zh: 行了，不要这么慌张。你们就维护好现场的秩序，剩下的交给专业人士。
messages.en: That's fine, don't panic. You can just maintain order on the site and leave the rest to the professionals.

messages.zh: 比如我的，企鹅物流。
messages.en: Take my example. Penguin Logistics.

messages.zh: ......我怎么记得我们是来度假的？姑且问一下，有加班费吗？
messages.en: ...I thought we were on a vacation? Anyways, may I ask if there's overtime pay?

messages.zh: 在旅店呆了这么久，的确可以适当运动一下。
messages.en: We've been staying at the hotel for so long, I think it's time for some exercise.

messages.zh: 因为德克萨......因为“空”你一直待在宾馆里看书嘛......
messages.en: That's because Texas... you've been reading in the hotel because of "Sora"...

messages.zh: ......好像是还有这个约定。战斗的时候反应得过来吗，德克萨斯？
messages.en: ...Seems like there's such an arrangement. Can you handle the fight, Texas?

messages.zh: 没问题！
messages.en: Not a problem!

messages.zh: 老板，这里完工了，要帮我订明天最前排的套票哟！
messages.en: Boss, after we're finished here. Book me a front row ticket for tomorrow.

messages.zh: 大帝先生，这、这些人是怎么回事？
messages.en: Mr.Emperor, these, what's with these people?

messages.zh: 就当我们是老板......是大帝先生的私人保镖吧。
messages.en: Think of us as bosses... The Emperor's personal bodyguard

messages.zh: 虽然我们是个物流公司。
messages.en: Although we are a logistics company.

messages.zh: 本来我们的业务扩展就很丰富嘛。之前不是还买了一家爵士乐酒吧？
messages.en: We already have a lot of business expansion. Didn't we also bought a jazz bar lately?

messages.zh: 还有那些总是被当成沙包的叙拉古黑帮，不过最近安分得有些诡异。
messages.en: And those Syracuse gangsters who are always treated as sandbags, but they've been a little weirdly quiet lately.

messages.zh: 你以为我们每个月要在龙门打多少次架？
messages.en: How many times do you think we fight in Lungmen every month?

messages.zh: 论斗殴和火并，我们才是行家里手，最顶级的，无人能及。
messages.en: When it comes to fights and gunfights, we are the expert, the king, the best of them all.

messages.zh: 老子等这一刻好久了！西边的企鹅！你既然敢光明正大地出现，就等死吧！！
messages.en: I've been waiting for this moment for a long time! Western penguin! Since you dare to appear so openly, go to hell and die!!

messages.zh: ......你们是成立了一个贼喊捉贼协会吗？好吧，反正也和我想的差不太多。
messages.en: ...Did you guys form a society of thieves to catch a thief? Well, it's not too far from what I thought.

messages.zh: 德克萨斯，动手。
messages.en: Texas, get to work.

messages.zh: 明白——啊。
messages.en: Understood——Ah.

messages.zh: ——明白了！我上了！
messages.en: ——Understood! Here I come!
